response.answer_text: Being an Engineering graduate , after trying many things at an early age in life took decision to make career in Stock market as Trader, Trainer & Portfolio manager. Previously i just heard about this story called “ Harshad Mehta Scam 1992 “ and for me it was just another scam that took place in india like that. And i never took interest to go through also . When i got to know that SONY LIV released weseries of Harshad Mehta story then i just wanted to watch for time pass !! But after watching the first episode i felt , There is something Great in this story and watched the whole 10 episodes continuously 10 hours almost with same curiosity till last minute of the episode. I can say, It is just awesome , Superb !! After watching THE BIG BULL HARSHAD MEHTA’s 15 Years of life from ZERO to HERO to CRIMINAL , Learnt lots of life lessons & stock market lessons in 10 hours !!  I wish every Trader & Investor should Learn those lessons to make sure lead better life !! STOCK MARKET can also be called as SHOCK MARKET because It can surprise you anytime and you should better be prepared to face it better.RISK hai toh ISHQ hai !!! [ Those who created history took risks in their life and It’s must . But most important thing is “ It should be calculated RISK “Never ever Reveal your next move to anyone in life and in business too. This one was top lesson from BIG BULLAlways have patience in life and also in Stock Market , because anything can change at any point of time till end .Every Problem has it’s solution but make sure you think all the ways to find proper solution.In life & in Stock Market, Always look for Permanent solutions even if it takes more time to solve issues. Never ever look for easy solution if it creates another big problem in future.In life Always look for Long term decisions to make money and also to make decision rather than making a decision which shows short term gains but long term pain !In any kind of situation, never ever feel like it’s over. Always there will be way. Like everytime Harshad Mehta come out from his problems with patience.Never ever Invest your money in stock market by lending money or by loan or by promising assured returns . Better to take risk that can be digestible not like taking big risks like Harshad Mehta .Always observe everyone closely with whom you are surrounded with.Always have humble and learning attitude towards anything to learn in life.Mehta never hesitated to start learning anything at any point of time..Always say YES in life to whatever it comes, then LEARN & MASTER it !!Never think few things are impossible in life. Harshad Never ever said “ IMPOSSIBLE “ , he just started learning and then mastered .Never ever try to defeat the Stock Market . I repeat Never Ever !!To build a Fortune, First Build Great Team and Great Leaders who can multiply it among the team!!Always think positive in life and in Stock market whatever the situations may be . Never ever give up !! Harshad was a Great example of it.These are few lessons which i learnt and noticed from web-episode “ SCAM 1992- HARSHAD MEHTA STORY” !! Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story is a web series based on the Indian stockbroker Harshad Mehta. The web series is directed by National Film Award Winner Hansal Mehta and the role of Harshad Mehta is played by Pratik Gandhi. Cast: Pratik Gandhi, Shreya Dhanwanthary, Anant Mahadevan, Nikhil Dwivedi, Rajat Kapoor, Satish Kaushik Director: Hansal Mehta Language: Hindi Scam 1992 is based on the real-life story of Indian Stockbroker Harshad Mehta. Also known as “The Big Bull”, “Bachchan of BSE (Bombay Stock Exchange)”. The web series presents the history of Harshad Mehta from the beginning of his journey in the stock market to becoming the Big Bull and later getting involved in a scam and the subsequent downfall. Every major aspect of Harshad Mehta’s life is explored and is very well portrayed with significant events of both personal and professional life. The series shows the functionality of the Indian Stock Market in such a way that even an individual with zero knowledge of the stock market will find it extremely interesting. Throughout the series, the audience is made to understand all the policies or terminologies regarding the stock market and money market in a very easy and transparent way. Jargons like Bull, Bear, BR, SGL, PSU, PSE,etc. are frequently used in the series. Harshad Mehta used several prominent bank’s money in exchange for fake Bank Securities to manipulate the stock market. He used the loopholes in the Indian Banking System to increase his profits in the stock market and money market. To fully understand how exactly this happened, Do watch the web series. Shreya Dhanwanthary plays Sucheta Dalal, a journalist who investigates these irregularities in the banking system and brings it to people’s attention. She was the first person to introduce the word “Scam” in the Indian Banking system. The series bravely shows the real facts and is fearless for using the real-life names of the highly influential people involved in the scam. The series has a total of 10 episodes with each episode around 50-60 mins. It has an extremely detailed screenplay that is very engaging and interesting. Performances The performance of the entire cast is excellent and not a single actor disappoints in their act. Pratik Gandhi as Harshad Mehta is the perfect casting and also the biggest USP of the series. The Mindset, attitude, style, and dialogue delivery by Pratik Gandhi has hit the Bullseye and is extremely praiseworthy. The direction of the series is excellent as well as extraordinary. Also, the expectations of the audience from the National Award Winning Director, Hansal Mehta is always high. Hansal Mehta, who has earlier made movies on real-life stories such as Shahid (2013), Aligarh (2015) & Omerta (2018) lives up to the expectations and has given us one of the best Indian web series with Scam 1992. Background Music (BGM) BGM of the series that is superb and my favorite from 2020 so far. It is the first time that I have never skipped the intro part of the series for all the 10 episodes due to its extremely powerful background music. It’s classy as well as massy at the same time. I think after KGF, this has become my personal favorite BGM. Overall Review Scam 1992 is an extremely interesting and engaging web series that gets all the aspects of the series perfectly executed. Scam 1992 is one of the best Indian web series. Highly Recommended !!!
